text: Star rated doesn't mean anything here, but this hospital was well kept and security was strict. Clean and quite place.
I respect security but this person I encountered is another level at CDC security post.

This is a Palliative Ward of Tan Tock Seng Hospital. Patients in this ward receive the best care till their end days. My mother was transferred to Ward 83 till her final days 18.07.2019 where she passed away peacefully at 7.30pm. Thank you and appreciate the attending doctors Dr. Ang, Dr. Lim and Dr. Koh and nurses who have been there taking care of mom and also not to mention the staffers of Tan Tock Seng Hospital.
Great palliative care amenities for patients. Lots of greenery surrounding the premises. However, I think a more suitable name change for this hosptial wing should be made.
Used mainly as a palliative and recovery site for patients. The building name is misleading and patients with diseases are not located here unless there are widespread outbreaks.
